Sample Records

Sed ut perspiciatis, unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam eaque ipsa, quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt, explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem, quia voluptas sit, aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur magni dolores eos, qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt, neque porro quisquam est, qui dolorem ipsum, quia dolor sit.

SAMPLE RECORDS

Collection

Description Document With Instantiations

Description Document

Instantiation

PLAIN TEXT FORMAT
DESCRIPTION DOCUMENT: ASSET DATE: 2013-11-19 IDENTIFIER: FRON 3204 Source: PBS NOLA Code TITLE: Who Was Lee Harvey Oswald? Title type: Episode TITLE: FRONTLINE Title type: Series TITLE: 3204 Title type: Episode Number SUBJECT: Lee Harvey Oswald Subject type: Person DESCRIPTION: FRONTLINE marks the 40th anniversary of President Kennedy’s assassination with an encore broadcast of Who Was Lee Harvey Oswald? — an investigative biography of the man at the center of the political crime of the century. The three-hour documentary special traces Oswald’s life from his boyhood to that fateful day in Dallas on Nov. 22, 1963, posing a number of questions - Was Oswald the emotionally disturbed “lone gunman”? Was he one of two gunmen that day in Dallas? Or was he an unwitting scapegoat for the real assassins? GENRE: Documentary CREATOR: CREATOR: Cran, William CREATOR ROLE: Producer CREATOR: CREATOR: Loeterman, Ben CREATOR ROLE: Producer
XML FORMAT 
          
            
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

<pbcoreDescriptionDocument xmlns="http://www.pbcore.org/PBCore/PBCoreNamespace.html" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.pbcore.org/PBCore/PBCoreNamespace.html https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WGBH/PBCore_2.1/master/pbcore-2.1.xsd">

  <pbcoreAssetDate>2013-11-19</pbcoreAssetDate>

  <pbcoreIdentifier source="PBS NOLA Code">FRON 3204</pbcoreIdentifier>

  <pbcoreTitle titleType="Episode">Who Was Lee Harvey Oswald?</pbcoreTitle>

  <pbcoreTitle titleType="Series">Frontline</pbcoreTitle>

  <pbcoreTitle titleType="Episode Number">3204</pbcoreTitle>

  <pbcoreSubject subjectType="Person">Lee Harvey Oswald</pbcoreSubject>

  <pbcoreDescription>FRONTLINE marks the 40th anniversary of President Kennedy’s assassination with an encore broadcast of Who Was Lee Harvey Oswald? — an investigative biography of the man at the center of the political crime of the century. The three-hour documentary special traces Oswald’s life from his boyhood to that fateful day in Dallas on Nov. 22, 1963, posing a number of questions: Was Oswald the emotionally disturbed “lone gunman”? Was he one of two gunmen that day in Dallas? Or was he an unwitting scapegoat for the real assassins?</pbcoreDescription>

  <pbcoreGenre>Documentary</pbcoreGenre>

  <pbcoreCreator>

    <creator>Cran, William</creator>

    <creatorRole>Producer</creatorRole>

  </pbcoreCreator>

  <pbcoreCreator>

    <creator>Loeterman, Ben</creator>

    <creatorRole>Producer</creatorRole>

  </pbcoreCreator>

</pbcoreDescriptionDocument>
